data.persona: I am a patron of the village tavern. I have been here all day, drinking all the ale and beer I can. I should not drive my cart back home.
data.description:
You are in the The Dancing Stoat.
The Dancing Stoat is a cheerful little pub characterized by its unusually brightly-lot interior and uncommonly well-equipped kitchen. The rooms upstairs are nothing special, but the main hall is filled with delicious smells at all hours of the day and night. The Dancing Stoat's exterior is plain save for a sign showing a brown-furred stoat gamboling in a field. The chairs are unusually comfortable and well-made, and large windows and plentiful torches ensure that the space feels brighter and cheerier than a typical pub.
There's a rug, two torchs, a well-equipped kitchen, a mug, two windows, and a chair here.
The goblin king's bartender is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The Dancing Stoat is one of several pubs and taverns in town. It has a reputation for good food at the expense of mediocre lodging. data.short_motivation: I want to beat up the goblin king's bartender
data.mid_motivation: I hope to avoid paying for my drinks tonight
data.long_motivation: I hope to keep patronising The Dancing Stoat for a long time
